mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cafe_application( application_no , user_no , cafe_no , reg_date , question1, question2, question3 , answer1, answer2, answer3, accept_status_code, member_nickname ) VALUES ( seq_application_no.NEXTVAL , #{userNo} , #{cafeNo} , SYSDATE , #{question1:VARCHAR} , #{question2:VARCHAR} , #{question3:VARCHAR} , #{answer1:VARCHAR} , #{answer2:VARCHAR}, #{answer3:VARCHAR}, 'ca101', #{memberNickname})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT u.user_id,c.member_nickname, c.application_no, c.user_no, c.cafe_no, c.reg_date, c.question1, c.question2, c.question3, c.answer1, c.answer2, c.answer3, c.accept_status_code FROM cafe_application c, users u
c.user_no = u.user_no(+)
AND c.member_nickname like '%' || #{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND u.user_id like '%' || #{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY application_no ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT * FROM cafe_application c, users u
c.user_no = u.user_no(+)
AND c.member_nickname like '%' || #{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND u.user_id like '%' || #{searchKeyword}||'%'
) countTable
mapper.sql: SELECT a.application_no, a.user_no, a.member_nickname, a.reg_date, a.accept_status_code, c.cafe_no, c.cafe_icon, c.url, c.cafe_type, c.cafe_name, a.question1, a.answer1, a.question2, a.answer2, a.question3, a.answer3 FROM cafe_application a, cafe c WHERE a.cafe_no = c.cafe_no
mapper.select: AND a.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY application_no DESC
